summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The DVD_TitleAttributes structure contains information about a DVD title.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.AppMode
member.summary: A variable of type indicating whether the Navigator is in karaoke mode.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.VideoAttributes
member.summary: A structure containing information about the "main" video of the current menu or title.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.ulNumberOfAudioStreams
member.summary: The number of audio streams available in the title.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.AudioAttributes
member.summary: An array of structures containing information about each available audio stream in the current title.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.ulNumberOfSubpictureStreams
member.summary: The number of subpicture streams available in the title.

member.name: DVD_TitleAttributes.SubpictureAttributes
member.summary: An array of structures that contain information about each available subpicture stream in the title.
